    • 方法详细资料

      • creatNoLogo

        public static final void creatNoLogo(java.lang.String content,
                                     int width,
                                     int height,
                                     java.lang.String path,
                                     java.lang.String resultName)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        create the QR code with no logo
        参数:
        content - : the content in QR code
        width - : the width of image created final
        height - :the height of image created final
        path - : the path you want to save
        resultName - : the image name
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - : while the file not found,throw the Exception

      • creatNoLogo

        public static final void creatNoLogo(java.lang.String content,
                                     int width,
                                     int height,
                                     java.lang.String path,
                                     java.lang.String resultName,
                                     int infoRGB,
                                     int otherRGB)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        create the QR code with no logo but you can set the image color that you want
        参数:
        content - : the content in QR code
        width: - the width of image created final
        height - :the height of image created final
        path - : the path you want to save
        resultName - : the image name
        infoRGB - : the color of the part with information , the value should be RGB form
        otherRGB - : the color of the part with no information , the value should be RGB form
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - : while the file not found,throw the Exception

      • creatWithLogo

        public static final void creatWithLogo(java.lang.String content,
                                       int width,
                                       int height,
                                       java.lang.String path,
                                       java.lang.String logoPath,
                                       int logoWidth,
                                       int logoHeight,
                                       java.lang.String resultName)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        create the QR code with logo in center
        参数:
        content - : the content in QR code
        width - : the width of image created final
        height - : the height of image created final
        path - : the path you want to save
        logoPath - : the path of logo
        logoWidth - : The logo width to be generated (logo area should not exceed 25% of the area of the two-dimensional code).
        logoHeight - : The logo width to be generated (logo area should not exceed 25% of the area of the two-dimensional code).
        resultName - : image name
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - : while the file not found,throw the Exception

      • creatWithLogo

        public static final void creatWithLogo(java.lang.String content,
                                       int width,
                                       int height,
                                       java.lang.String path,
                                       java.lang.String logoPath,
                                       int logoWidth,
                                       int logoHeight,
                                       java.lang.String resultName,
                                       int infoRGB,
                                       int otherRGB)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        create the QR code with logo and you can set the image color that you want
        参数:
        content - : the content in QR code
        width - : the width of image created final
        height - : the height of image created final
        path - : the path you want to save
        logoPath - : the path of logo
        logoWidth - : The logo width to be generated (logo area should not exceed 25% of the area of the two-dimensional code).
        logoHeight - : The logo height to be generated (logo area should not exceed 25% of the area of the two-dimensional code).
        resultName - : image name
        infoRGB - : the color of the part with information , the value should be RGB form
        otherRGB - : the color of the part with no information , the value should be RGB form
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - : while the file not found,throw the Exception
